import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np
import math
import emcee
import corner
from astropy.cosmology import FlatLambdaCDM
from astropy.cosmology import WMAP9 as cosmo
from astropy.io import fits as pyfits

mb = np.zeros(740)
x1 = np.zeros(740)
c = np.zeros(740)

for i in range(740):
    mb[i] = datos[i][3]
    x1[i] = datos[i][5]
    c[i] = datos[i][7]

err_mb = np.zeros(740)
err_x1 = np.zeros(740)
err_c = np.zeros(740)

for i in range(740):
    err_mb[i] = datos[i][4]
    err_x1[i] = datos[i][6]
    err_c[i] = datos[i][8]

masa_estelar = np.zeros(740)
conjunto = np.zeros(740)

for i in range(740):
    masa_estelar[i] = datos[i][9]
    conjunto[i] = datos[i][16]

c_n = pyfits.open('C_stat.fits')['PRIMARY'].data + pyfits.open('C_cal.fits')['PRIMARY'].data + pyfits.open('C_model.fits')['PRIMARY'].data + pyfits.open('C_bias.fits')['PRIMARY'].data + pyfits.open('C_host.fits')['PRIMARY'].data + pyfits.open('C_dust.fits')['PRIMARY'].data + pyfits.open('C_pecvel.fits')['PRIMARY'].data + pyfits.open('C_nonia.fits')['PRIMARY'].data

a = np.zeros((740, 2220))
n = np.zeros ((2220, 1))
delta_kronecker = np.zeros((740, 2220, 3))

for i in range(740):
    n[3*i] = mb[i]
    n[3*i + 1] = x1[i]
    n[3*i + 2] = c[i]

masa_aux = np.ones(740)
diag_1 = np.zeros((740, 740))
diag_2 = np.zeros((740, 740))
diag_3 = np.zeros((740, 740))

def log_likelihood_mod(theta):
    omega, alfa, beta, masa, delta = theta
    for i in range(740):
        for j in range(2220):
            a[i][j] = delta_kronecker[i][j][0] + alfa*delta_kronecker[i][j][1] + beta*delta_kronecker[i][j][2]
    model = np.matmul(a, n) - (masa*masa_aux).reshape(740, 1) + (delta*par_masa).reshape(740, 1)
    omega = abs(omega)
    d_l = FlatLambdaCDM(H0 = 70, Om0 = omega, Tcmb0 = 2.725).luminosity_distance(z)
    mu_stand = np.zeros(740)
    for i in range(740):
        mu_aux = 5*math.log10(d_l[i].value/10e-6)
        mu_stand[i] = mu_aux
    likelihood_aux = model - mu_stand.reshape(740, 1)
    c_cov = np.matmul(np.matmul(a, c_n), np.transpose(a)) + diag_1 + diag_2 + diag_3
    c_cov_inv = np.linalg.inv(c_cov)
    likelihood = np.matmul(np.matmul(np.transpose(likelihood_aux), c_cov_inv), likelihood_aux)
    return likelihood

pos = [0.3, 0.15, 3.2, -19.1, -0.070] + 1e-4 * np.random.randn(10, 5)
nwalkers, ndim = pos.shape

sampler = emcee.EnsembleSampler(nwalkers, ndim, log_probability)
sampler.run_mcmc(pos, 3000, progress=True);
flat_samples = sampler.get_chain(discard=70, thin=10, flat=True)
print(flat_samples.shape)

fig = corner.corner(
    flat_samples,
    bins = 15,
    hist_bin_factor = 5,
    labels=[r"$\Omega_m$", r"$\alpha$", r"$\beta$", r"$M_{B}$", r"$\Delta_M$"],
    quantiles = [0.16, 0.5, 0.84],
    title_fmt = '.4f',
    show_titles = True, title_kwargs={"fontsize": 12}

from IPython.display import display, Math
labels = [r"\Omega_m", r"\alpha",r"\beta",r"M_{B}",r"\Delta_M"]
res = np.zeros(ndim)
for i in range(ndim):
    mcmc = np.percentile(flat_samples[:, i], [16, 50, 84])
    res[i] = mcmc[1]
    q = np.diff(mcmc)
    txt = "\mathrm{{{3}}} = {0:.3f}_{{-{1:.3f}}}^{{{2:.3f}}}"
    txt = txt.format(mcmc[1], q[0], q[1], labels[i])
    display(Math(txt))
